title: Evangelical Lutheran Church "Concord"
text:
The Evangelical Lutheran Church "Concord" (Евангелическо-Лютеранская Церковь "Согласие") is a small confessional <a href="Lutheranism">Lutheran</a> denomination based in <a href="Russia">Russia</a>. Established in 1992, it is a mission denomination assisted by missionaries supported by the <a href="Wisconsin%20Evangelical%20Lutheran%20Synod">Wisconsin Evangelical Lutheran Synod</a>. It currently consists of five congregations and several Christian Information Centers, all in the province of <a href="Siberia">Siberia</a> in <a href="Russia">Russia</a>.
The denomination is headquartered in <a href="Akademgorodok">Akademgorodok</a>, just south of <a href="Novosibirsk">Novosibirsk</a> where it also operates a seminary for the training of clergy.
Affiliations.
The Evangelical Lutheran Church "Concord" is a member of the <a href="Confessional%20Evangelical%20Lutheran%20Conference">Confessional Evangelical Lutheran Conference</a>.
